overview: On May 17, 1993, a group of artists from Belgrade and Novi Sad, by freezing their works they left their individual artistic practices in a symbolic way and started to work collectively under the name Led art. With the slogan "Ethics before aesthetics", during the stormy nineties they tried to draw attention to negative social trends with a series of actions. Three decades later, we are looking for an answer to the question - was it worth it?
title: reKAPITULACIJA
